(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (ADVP (RB just))
      (VP (VBN published)
        (NP (DT the) (JJ first))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP
            (NP (DT a) (NN series))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NN targetted)))))
        (PP (IN at)
          (NP (NNS parents)))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(published-4, I-1)
aux(published-4, have-2)
advmod(published-4, just-3)
root(ROOT-0, published-4)
det(first-6, the-5)
dobj(published-4, first-6)
prep(published-4, in-7)
det(series-9, a-8)
pobj(in-7, series-9)
prep(series-9, of-10)
pobj(of-10, targetted-11)
prep(published-4, at-12)
pobj(at-12, parents-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP plan)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB cover)
            (NP
              (NP (DT some))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (JJ common) (NNS things))
                  (SBAR
                    (WHNP (WDT that))
                    (S
                      (VP (VBZ affects)
                        (NP (NNS kids))))))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(plan-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, plan-2)
aux(cover-4, to-3)
xcomp(plan-2, cover-4)
dobj(cover-4, some-5)
prep(some-5, of-6)
det(things-9, the-7)
amod(things-9, common-8)
pobj(of-6, things-9)
nsubj(affects-11, that-10)
rcmod(things-9, affects-11)
dobj(affects-11, kids-12)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VBG starting)
      (PP (IN with)
        (NP (NN fever))
        (, ,)))))


root(ROOT-0, starting-1)
prep(starting-1, with-2)
pobj(with-2, fever-3)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP
      (ADVP (RB then))
      (IN to)
      (NP (NN cough)))
    (, ,)))


advmod(to-2, then-1)
root(ROOT-0, to-2)
pobj(to-2, cough-3)


(ROOT
  (NP (NNP diarrhoea) (NNP ,)))


nn(,-2, diarrhoea-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB head)
      (NP (FW injuries) (FW etc) (FW etc.)))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, head-1)
nn(etc.-4, injuries-2)
nn(etc.-4, etc-3)
dobj(head-1, etc.-4)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ is) (RB not)
      (VP (VBN meant)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB be)
              (ADJP (JJ exhaustive)))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubjpass(meant-4, It-1)
auxpass(meant-4, is-2)
neg(meant-4, not-3)
root(ROOT-0, meant-4)
aux(exhaustive-7, to-5)
cop(exhaustive-7, be-6)
xcomp(meant-4, exhaustive-7)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (RB just) (DT some) (JJ simple) (NNS pointers))
    (PP (TO to)
      (NP (JJ empower) (NNS parents)))
    (S
      (VP (TO to)
        (VP (VB manage)
          (NP
            (NP (PRP$ their) (NN child) (POS 's))
            (NN illness)))))
    (. .)))


advmod(pointers-4, just-1)
det(pointers-4, some-2)
amod(pointers-4, simple-3)
root(ROOT-0, pointers-4)
prep(pointers-4, to-5)
amod(parents-7, empower-6)
pobj(to-5, parents-7)
aux(manage-9, to-8)
infmod(pointers-4, manage-9)
poss(child-11, their-10)
poss(illness-13, child-11)
possessive(child-11, 's-12)
dobj(manage-9, illness-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (VP (MD can)
      (VP (VB read)
        (NP (PRP it))
        (PP (IN by)
          (S
            (VP (VBG clicking)
              (ADVP (RB here)))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(read-3, You-1)
aux(read-3, can-2)
root(ROOT-0, read-3)
dobj(read-3, it-4)
prep(read-3, by-5)
pcomp(by-5, clicking-6)
advmod(clicking-6, here-7)
